description: Try our easy to follow Pasta Salad + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta Salad + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths Select frozen mixed berries
420g Woolworths Mexican style 3 bean mix, rinsed, drained
2 slices Champagne thinly sliced leg ham (35 g) )

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water following packet instructions or until al dente. Refresh under cold running water. Drain.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt and mayonnaise in a medium bowl. Add pasta, bean mix, capsicum and leafy mix, then gently toss to combine. (Pasta salad serves 3.)

HowToTip.tipText: Store leftover salad in an airtight container in the fridge.

recipeInstructions.text: Place one-third of the pasta mixture in an airtight container. Pack next to frozen drink, cool brick or frozen yoghurt in lunch box to keep cool.
Snack 1: Top ham with carrot. Roll up. Place in an airtight container.
Snack 2: Place yoghurt topped with berries in an airtight container.
Snack 3: Pack banana in lunch box.
